column3: Traffic;Preah Sihanouk Province:------ According to preliminary news reports
column4: there has been an accident involving a sand truck
column6: and several motorbikes.------One person died at the scene and many more were injured at least 7 Cambodians (including children) and 8 Chinese. ------The incident happened at 12:00 pm on January 2
column7: 2019 at Wat La in Sihanouk Ville.------Rescuers
column9: intervened to rescue the injured and transport the injured to hospital.------Nasty photos in link:  ------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/400935
